Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: There is no reason for this to be tagged with v1.0.0 since sbft is not a valid option for v1.0.0 to begin with.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: ~kchristidis that may have been me. If sbft is for v1.1 then please mark as affects v1.1 and fixVersion v1.1.
